parameters.name: DataSourceDescription
parameters.description: Service description, with a maximum length of 256 characters.

parameters.name: DataSourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the data source. Valid values:

*   mysql

- postgresql

*   hdfs

- hive

parameters.name: EmrInstanceId
parameters.description: When HadoopCreateType is Emr, the value of this field is the EMR instance ID.

parameters.name: HDFSConf
parameters.description: The content of the Hadoop hdfs-site.xml file. This parameter must be specified when DataSourceType is set to HDFS.

parameters.name: HadoopCoreConf
parameters.description: The content of the Hadoop core-site.xml file.

parameters.name: HadoopCreateType
parameters.description:
The type of the external service. Valid values:

*   emr: E-MapReduce (EMR) Hadoop cluster.
*   selfCreate: self-managed Hadoop cluster.

parameters.name: HadoopHostsAddress
parameters.description: The IP address and hostname of the Hadoop cluster (data source) in the /etc/hosts file.

parameters.name: HiveConf
parameters.description: The content of the Hadoop hive-site.xml file. This parameter must be specified when DataSourceType is set to Hive.

parameters.name: MapReduceConf
parameters.description: The content of the Hadoop mapred-site.xml file. This parameter must be specified when DataSourceType is set to HDFS.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: YarnConf
parameters.description: The content of the Hadoop yarn-site.xml file. This parameter must be specified when DataSourceType is set to HDFS.
